metadata.title: CVE-2018-18764 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable arbitrary memory read vulnerability exists in the MQTTpacket-parsing functionality of Cesanta Mongoose 6.13. It is a heap-basedbuffer over-read in a parse_mqtt getu16 call. A specially crafted MQTTSUBSCRIBE packet can cause an arbitrary out-of-bounds memory readpotentially resulting in information disclosure and denial of service. Anattacker needs to send a specially crafted MQTT packet over the network totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: smplayer package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
